regen.absent_element: error generation if configuration is missing
regen.new_specification: The system shall generate an error if the required configuration is not provided.
If the required configuration is not provided, the system shall generate an error message stating that the configuration is mandatory before proceeding.

regen.absent_element: error generation when explicit configuration is absent
regen.new_specification: If explicit configuration is absent, the system shall produce an error.

label: Errors should be generated in the absence of a configuration.
absence: action of generating errors in the absence of a configuration.
